packs.name: AFK Display
packs.description: Greys out a player's name that is not moving for 5 minutes.

packs.name: Multiplayer Sleep
packs.description: Not all players in the overworld must sleep to skip the night and the rain. /function multiplayer_sleep/config for settings.

packs.name: Anti Creeper Grief
packs.description: Prevents creepers from blowing up blocks.

packs.name: Anti Enderman Grief
packs.description: Prevents endermen from picking up blocks.

packs.name: Anti Ghast Grief
packs.description: Prevents ghasts from blowing up blocks.

packs.name: Bat Membranes
packs.description: Disable phantoms and get membranes from bats instead.

packs.name: Dragon Drops
packs.description: Makes the Ender Dragon drop a dragon egg and elytra on death.

packs.name: Larger Phantoms
packs.description: Makes naturally spawning phantoms larger the longer you do not sleep.

packs.name: Villager Death Messages
packs.description: Notifies the server in chat when a villager is killed.

packs.name: Kill Empty Boats
packs.description: Adds an admin command to kill all boats without passengers.

packs.name: Gem Villagers
packs.description:
Adds functions to spawn villagers that include custom mini-block trades.
Needs Holiday Creator Features Experimental toggle enabled.

packs.name: Treasure Gems
packs.description:
Adds the chance for treasure gems to spawn inside loot chests. Used to trade with Gem Villagers.
Needs Holiday Creator Features Experimental toggle enabled.

packs.name: Wandering Trades
packs.description:
Adds Mini Blocks to the Wandering Trader's trades.
Needs Holiday Creator Features Experimental toggle enabled.

packs.name: Wandering Trades (Hermit Edition)
packs.description:
Adds Hermit heads and Mini Blocks to the Wandering Trader's trades.
Needs Holiday Creator Features Experimental toggle enabled.
